00112 #define TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, class_name, label, propagator)\
00113   {  \
00114     EUROPA::ConstraintEngine* ce = (EUROPA::ConstraintEngine*) assembly.getComponent("ConstraintEngine"); \
00115     using EUROPA::ConcreteConstraintType; \
00116     using EUROPA::LabelStr; \
00117     REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(ce->getCESchema(), class_name, #label, #propagator);\
00118   }
00119 
00130 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00131   REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00132 
00143 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00144   REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00145 
00156 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00157   REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00158 
00169 #define TREX_REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(assembly, class_name, label) \
00170   REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
